Text:
Thanks so much for the upload...

P.S.  Dont forget to normalize you FLAC! to -1db before converting!

FLAC is the only sane way to release audio

"fidelity be damned" has no place on the internet!

cheers

now I can make an informed purchasing decision

I will NEVER buy mp3

I long for the day a music market is available for FLAC tracks
